WorkItem.Description: Libram of Eternal Rest, after adding to Rawr via Tools->Item Editor->Add... (ID = 27917), cannot be equipped.  The same problem occurs with some of the other librams such as Libram of Divine Judgement.
WorkItem.Summary: Several Librams do not show up as available to be equipped

Comments.Message: All pally librams, shaman totems, and DK sigils are like this.  They are all in the database, but are not equipable.  Druids do not have this issue.
They haven't been modeled. Not all are like this, some are modeled, for each class, and not all are modeled for any class.
I beg to differ on the druid idols being implemented. I can name several idols that don't seem to be registering with the system (the PvP village in Grizzly Hills Idols come to mind).
